subject: Street Light Repair Needed
description: The street light on Main Street corner has been broken for several days. It's causing safety concerns for residents walking at night.

subject: Garbage Collection Issue
description: Garbage has not been collected in our area for the past week. The accumulation is causing health and sanitation concerns.

subject: Pothole on Oak Avenue
description: Large pothole has formed on Oak Avenue that could damage vehicles. Needs immediate attention.
